mapper.select: select b.bandId,b.userId, b.bandName, b.bandInfo,b.bandFile,u.userId, u.username from band b inner join user u on b.userId=u.userId Order by bandId DESC
select b.bandId,b.userId, b.bandName, b.bandInfo,b.bandFile,u.userId, u.username from band b inner join user u on b.userId=u.userId where bandId=#{bandId}
mapper.insert: insert into band (userId,bandName, bandInfo, bandFile) values (#{userId},#{bandName},#{bandInfo},#{uuidFilename})
mapper.update: update band set bandName = #{bandName}, bandInfo = #{bandInfo}, bandFile=#{uuidFilename} where bandId = #{bandId}
mapper.select: select count(fromId) from user u inner join follow f on u.userId=f.fromId where toId=#{toId}

select distinct u.username, c.bandName, c.bandInfo, c.toId, c.bandId
from (select f.followId, f.fromId, f.toId, f. bandId, b.userId, b.bandName, b.bandInfo from follow f left outer join band b on f.bandId=b.bandId where f.fromId=#{userId}) as c, user u where u.userId=c.userId;
select b.bandId,b.userId, b.bandName, b.bandInfo,b.bandFile,u.userId, u.username from band b inner join user u on b.userId=u.userId where u.userId=#{userId} Order by bandId DESC
